text:
jyOti#radhArayath saqmrAD jyOti#radhArayath svaqrAD jyOti#radhArayat || 
agnE# yuqkShvA hi yE tavASvA#sO dEva sAqdhava#H | 
araqM ~Mvaha#ntyAqSava#H || 
yuqkShvA hi dE#vaqhUta#mAq(gm)q aSvA(gm)# agnE raqthIri#va | 
ni hOtA# pUqrvyaH sa#daH || 
draqPsaSca#skanda pRuthiqvImanuq dyAmiqmaM caq yOniqmanuq yaScaq pUrva#H | 
tRuqtIyaqM ~MyOniqmanu# saq~jcara#ntaM draqPsaM ju#hOqmyanu# saqpta - [  ] 40
